live_notify.description: Whether current user is subscribed to the upcoming live stream notification (if not subscribed to the author)

spectators.description: Number of spectators of the stream

count.description: Total number of videos in album

image.description: Album cover image in different sizes

image_blur.description: Need blur album thumb or not

updated_time.description: Date when the album has been updated last time in Unixtime

mp4_240.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 240p quality

mp4_360.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 360p quality

mp4_480.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 480p quality

mp4_720.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 720p quality

mp4_1080.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 1080p quality

mp4_1440.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 2K quality

mp4_2160.description: URL of the mpeg4 file with 4K quality

flv_320.description: URL of the flv file with 320p quality

photo_130.description: URL of the preview image with 130 px in width

photo_604.description: URL of the preview image with 604 px in width

date.description: Date when the note has been created in Unixtime

view_url.description: URL of the page with note preview

showmap.description: Information whether a map is showed

wall_get_filter.description: Filter to apply: 'owner' — posts by the wall owner, 'others' — posts by someone else, 'all' — posts by the wall owner and others (default), 'postponed' — timed posts (only available for calls with an 'access_token'), 'suggests' — suggested posts on a community wall

photo_200.description: URL of the preview image with 200 px in width

photo_586.description: URL of the preview image with 586 px in width

url.description: URL to an external site used to publish the post

photo_130.description: URL of the preview image with 130 px in width

photo_604.description: URL of the preview image with 604 px in width

date.description: Date when the comment has been added in Unixtime

copyright.description: Information about the source of the post

date.description: Date of publishing in Unixtime

is_archived.description: Is post archived, only for post owners

is_favorite.description: Information whether the post in favorites list

post_id.description: If post type 'reply', contains original post ID

parents_stack.description: If post type 'reply', contains original parent IDs stack

paid_duration.description: Value of this field need to pass in wall.post/edit in donut_paid_duration

placeholder.description: If placeholder was respond, text and all attachments will be hidden

can_publish_free_copy.description: Says whether group admin can post free copy of this donut post

edit_mode.description: Says what user can edit in post about donut properties

can_edit.description: Information whether current user can edit the post

created_by.description: Post creator ID (if post still can be edited)

can_delete.description: Information whether current user can delete the post

can_pin.description: Information whether current user can pin the post

is_pinned.description: Information whether the post is pinned

marked_as_ads.description: Information whether the post is marked as ads

topic_id.description: Topic ID. Allowed values can be obtained from newsfeed.getPostTopics method

copy_owner_id.description: ID of the source post owner

date.description: Date of publishing in Unixtime

is_favorite.description: Information whether the post in favorites list

thumb_src.description: URL of the preview image (type=photo only)

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post

date.description: Date when the comment has been added in Unixtime

can_delete.description: Information whether current user can delete the comment

date.description: Date when the comment has been added in Unixtime
Date when widgets on the page has been initialized firstly in Unixtime
